QuestionSet3_loops-code-question5_key2: Take input of weights of 11 people and then print their average and then check whether the average weight is a multiple of 5 or not? This means that when you will divide the average weight by 5, the remainder should be 0.
QuestionSet3_loops-code-question5_key4: Here you have to use input function. You can also use raw input to take the weights as inputs, inside the loop.
QuestionSet3_loops-code-question5_key6:
total_weight=0
for i in range(11):
 weight=int(input("Enter your weight:"))
 total_weight=total_weight+weight
average_weight=total_weight/11
print("average weight is:",average_weight)
if(average_weight%5==0):
 print("average weight is multiple of five")
else:
 print("average weight is not multiple of five")
